entry.title: https://github.com/GEOS-ESM/MAPL
entry.content: MAPL is a foundation layer of the GEOS architecture, whose original purpose is to supplement the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF)

entry.title: https://github.com/OpenFAST/openfast
entry.content: Main repository for the NREL-supported OpenFAST whole-turbine and FAST.Farm wind farm simulation codes.

entry.title: https://github.com/cp2k/cp2k
entry.content: Quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package

entry.title: https://github.com/earth-system-radiation/rte-rrtmgp
entry.content: RTE+RRTMGP is a set of codes for computing radiative fluxes in planetary atmospheres.

entry.title: https://github.com/ecmwf/fckit
entry.content: A Fortran toolkit for interoperating Fortran with C/C++

entry.title: https://github.com/esmf-org/esmf
entry.content: The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is a suite of software tools for developing high-performance, multi-component Earth science modeling applications.
